5. Appointed M/s. ACM & Associates as Internal Auditor of the company for the financial year 2024-25.
6. Approved the Appointment of Mrs. Anjali Vipulbhai Barot as the Whole Time Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company with effect from 30th may, 2024.
